title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing doors in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Seeing a door in a dream interprets the abundance of happiness and goodness by my side by God’s command. Open doors are praiseworthy changes for the dreamer and an improvement in the financial and family situation. Perhaps closing doors is a bad and bad thing and many problems and disputes that pass through this period. Each vision has its own details, which opens, closes, or She cleans the door, because a woman’s vision of wooden doors differs from that of men, and according to different interpretations of dream scholars, the iron door is different. And wood in a dream. In this article, everything related to seeing a door in a dream is described in detail.Interpretation of a dream about doors in a dream by Ibn SirinThe difference between Imam Ibn Sirin among many places to see a door in a dream is to change the living, clean the door, or replace it with the good and long life that the dreamer will obtain by God’s command. Stealing the door of a house indicates many sorrows and problems that the dreamer suffers from and he may not be able to overcome life’s difficulties. If the fortuneteller breaks the door of his house, this indicates the ignition of family disputes between them and perhaps between him and his wife. A closed door is a postponed decision, it may be marriage or money. Or security is what the dreamer is asking for, and God has postponed it, opening the door to livelihood, travel, and a new life. Interpretation of seeing a door in an unmarried girl’s dream: A door in a dream for an unmarried girl is a close marriage with a person of good character and religion, and a closed door in a dream is rejected for marriage. Also, the reality An unmarried woman breaking down a door in a dream is a sign of entering into bad relationships, and her vision may warn her of bad partners approaching her. The bell in a dream is a close connection or a marriage contract. Interpretation of a dream about a door for a married woman in a dream: A door in a married woman’s dream symbolizes her relationship with her husband. If it is closed, it means happiness and security. The interpretation of seeing the door open in a dream for a married woman means that she is unhappy, afraid, and anxious. The iron door is a sign of sustenance. The old door that was closed means that her marital life is in trouble. Interpretation of a dream about a door for a man in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a door in a man’s dream is an indication of an old job. A closed door means that he feels helpless and unable to achieve what he wants. If the man is traveling, then the door means returning to his homeland. The iron man’s door. His wife was pregnant, which means that he has a male child. The door is closed and cannot be opened, which indicates that there is a problem. Wooden and iron door in a dream. Seeing wooden doors has many meanings, as it indicates good character and a good reputation that the person who had the vision possesses, and the door Wooden interprets the death of distress and evil. The iron door in a dream carries with it the responsibilities of a difficult life, and a close marriage with a single woman and a bachelorette, and in a married woman’s dream, she bears it after a lot of effort and patience. Many dream scholars also believe that small doors in a dream represent the ability to Realizing dreams, dreams, and the great difficulties that the seeker of knowledge faces in order to succeed and reach what he wants, and God is Most High and knows the unseen. Father

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying wine for a divorced woman

If a married woman sees her husband drinking alcohol, this indicates illicit money, and God knows the unseen. It can also express competition, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband drinking alcohol in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband drinking alcohol in a dream. Drinking alcohol can be an indication of forbidden money, and God knows the unseen. As for a divorced woman, if she sees a man she knows drinking alcohol, it may express his connection to her, and he must be careful, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself drinking alcohol in a dream, this may be a sign of goodness and care, and God is greater and more knowledgeable. When you see a divorced woman drinking alcohol, this may be evidence of her freedom from worry and sadness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol by mistake in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol by mistake in a dream. Seeing yourself drinking alcohol indicates unrest and committing sins, and God knows best. Seeing a married man drinking alcohol in a dream is evidence of falsehood and disobedience, and God knows the unseen. It can also indicate a vision of drinking alcohol, and being forced or unwilling to do so, and it can be evidence of being forced to commit sins, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol with friends in a dream Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol with friends in a dream Seeing drinking alcohol with a group can indicate usury, and God knows the unseen. It can also indicate the consumption of forbidden money, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself drinking alcohol with a group, this may lead to strife, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen drinking alcohol, this may mean that she is eating something forbidden, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol in a mosque in a dream. We did not find clear interpretations for seeing this, except that seeing drinking alcohol to the point of intoxication can be evidence of unlawful money

title: Interpretation of fighting in a dream, seeing fighting and fighting in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a quarrel about a girl, about a single woman, about a married woman about a pregnant woman, a dream about a quarrel with words, a quarrel with relatives with a husband in a dream, a verbal quarrel, a quarrel with an unknown person, a fight with his sister, a quarrel in a dream. It is a very frightening dream that puts the dreamer in a state of extreme fear and anxiety to enter into disputes or conflicts with people in public life, and it is one of the things that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said, forbidding us and calling for the revival of peace in public life. Seeing fighting and fighting in a dreamIf you You dream that you are arguing with someone, this indicates some hidden negativity that you have towards someone in your reality. Perhaps you find it difficult to express your negative feelings, so the dream is trying to bring out those feelings. You need to express these feelings to resolve the internal conflict, otherwise the dream means that there are some disturbances That is disturbing you internally, perhaps you are under tremendous pressure and tension. If someone sees in a dream that he is arguing or quarreling with his mother or deceased father, this is his interpretation of not following their path or following a path in life other than the path that satisfies him. Quarrel with deceased parents in a dream is his Negative connotations, so the dreamer must re-examine himself on many issues and look for his mistakes and try to correct or overcome them every time, because a dream in this direction is a psychological message that must be carefully studied and understood correctly. If you hear the sound of a fight in your dream, then this It means dissatisfaction with a situation in reality. Dreaming of a quarrel or a fight indicates unhappiness or a fight followed by verbal arguments between the two parties. If the dreamer is a girl, then the dream of a quarrel about her indicates the occurrence of important events that have a bad impact on her. If two brothers quarrel in a dream, this is evidence of the loss of trade or business. A failed business that the dreamer will start. In general, a dream about a fight is never a positive dream, because in the dream it indicates bad luck and loss, as well as an unhappy life between the two parties. Interpretation of a quarrel in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing the dreamer arguing with his deceased parents in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is on the wrong path. He must return to the right path soon, as the violence of the father and mother in life is evidence of advice and guidance for the mother. Children. Seeing a state of disagreement with his sisters in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will accept many losses that he faces and must face them fully, as he must study his profession in the right way and not take risks. Also, seeing the dreamer arguing with someone he knows in a dream means that the dreamer will face problems with The same person because of the false promises that the two will make in life. A quarrel in a dream is evidence that the dreamer does not listen to the words or advice of anyone in public life and should be careful in his decisions. The dreamer who got into a loud fight that turned into a beating in the dream indicates... That he will hear important speeches and advice in the near future and he needs to listen to them. Fighting in a dream with the king is evidence that the dreamer will receive great clothes and clothing.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake in a dream There is no doubt that the snake is a source of panic, evil and fear, so we present in the following lines the interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake in a dream.. Interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake in a dream The interpretation of a dream about a large gray snake in a dream can be a sign of a period of problems and God knows best, as it may indicate that he is going through a period of distress that saddens him and God knows best If a married woman sees a large gray snake in a dream, it may represent betrayal or difficult judgments, and God knows best When you see a large snake in a dream, it can lead to problems that require patience and God knows best Interpretation of a dream about a golden snake in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a golden snake in a dream The yellow snake can be a sign of magic and God knows best When a married woman sees a yellow snake, it can express illness and God is Most High and All-Knowing If a young man sees a yellow snake, it can express magic and God knows best If a married man sees a yellow snake, it may be a sign of magic and God knows best Interpretation of a dream about wrapping a snake around the body in a dream Interpretation of a dream about wrapping a snake around his body in a dream may indicate a warning from neighbors and relatives and God knows best When a married man sees a snake wrapping over him, it may be a sign of difficulties And problems, and God knows the unseen. title: What is the interpretation of the dream of a husband marrying his wife according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his wifeMarriage is a sacred bond that brings together two people to form a good family and form a shared life based on affection and compassion from the article.Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his wifeThere have been many interpretations of jurists in interpreting a husband’s dream about marrying his wife, the most prominent of which are the following: Seeing a husband marrying his wife in a dream It symbolizes the painful events that the dreamer will go through in the coming period of her life. If a woman dreams that she is crying because her partner is marrying her, this is a sign that her sorrows will turn into joy and the anxiety and distress that are disturbing her life will disappear. In the event that the wife witnesses her husband marrying a woman she knows and is close to in In the dream, this indicates the existence of a friendship between her partner and this woman in reality, and she must keep him away from her in order to protect her home. If a married woman dreams that her husband is marrying a famous woman, this indicates abundant kindness and abundant livelihood on his way to her. If a woman sees that her husband is marrying a dead woman In a dream, this symbolizes that God - Glory be to Him - will achieve her goals and desires in a short time. Interpretation of the dream of a husband marrying his wife by Ibn Sirin. Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin - may God have mercy on him - mentioned a number of indications of seeing a husband marrying his wife in a dream, and we will explain this through the points Next: If an unmarried girl dreams of a man marrying his partner, this is a sign that she will soon start a new project that will bring her a lot of money. If a girl sees in a dream that she is marrying a man who is married to another woman, this will lead to a change in her circumstances for the better in the coming days. Coming and she is also a popular person among people. If an unmarried woman sees during her sleep a man marrying his wife, this is a sign that good things and advantages are coming her way and that she is earning a lot of money that allows her to get what she wants. If a woman sees that her husband is marrying another in In a dream, this expresses her constant anxiety in reality that he will do that, so she exaggerates her interest in him and his satisfaction. Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his Nabulsi wife. Imam Nabulsi explained in his interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his wife the following: A married man, if he sees in his dream that he is getting married Again with his partner, this is a sign that he will soon obtain a prominent position in society or an important position in his work. A husband’s dream of marrying his sick wife symbolizes facing a huge loss in a new project or business he is undertaking. Interpretation of a dream of a husband marrying his wife to an unmarried woman, if she sees For an unmarried girl, her sister’s husband is marrying her in a dream, then this is a sign that a young man with the same qualities and personality has proposed marriage to her, or that the groom is a relative of her sister’s husband or one of his relatives. companions. When the first girl dreams that the husband is marrying his wife, this means that she will receive good news soon. If the girl is a student and sees her husband marrying his partner in a dream, this is a sign of her success in her studies and obtaining the highest academic degrees. Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying his married wife. One of them says: Women: “I dreamed that my husband was marrying me while I was not pregnant.” This is y

If a girl sees in a dream that she is marrying a man who is married to another woman, this will lead to a change in her circumstances for the better in the coming days and she is also a beloved person among people. If an unmarried woman sees in her sleep a man marrying his wife, this is a sign that good things and benefits are coming her way and that she earns a lot of money that allows her to get what she wants. If a woman sees that her husband is marrying another in a dream, this expresses her constant concern in reality that he will do so, so she exaggerates her interest in him and his satisfaction. A husband's dream of marrying his sick wife symbolizes facing a huge loss in a project New or work he does. Companions. .And when the first girl dreams that the husband is marrying his wife, this means that she will receive good news soon. title: Interpretation of a dream about cohabitation depicted in a dream

title: Interpretation of dreams about buying a new car by Ibn Sirin and interpretation of a dream about buying a new blue car

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying a new car Interpreters believe that the dream carries many interpretations that differ according to the details of the dream and the feelings of the viewer, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing the purchase of a new car for a single woman, pregnant women and men according to Ibn Sirin and senior scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new car by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about buying a new car? Buying a new car in a dream is a sign of success in practical life, and if the dreamer is a student of knowledge and dreams that he is buying a new car, this indicates his excellence in his studies and obtaining the highest bicycles, and seeing the purchase of a car indicates that the dreamer will change himself and get rid of his negative habits. If the dreamer buys a new and beautiful car in his dream, this indicates the return of the traveler, and if the dreamer is single and dreams of buying a new expensive car, this indicates that he will soon marry a beautiful, good woman. Morals and falling in love with her at first sight. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new car by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the purchase of a new car is an indication of the abundant good that awaits the dreamer in his coming days. If the dreamer buys a new white car, the dream symbolizes his success in his professional life and getting a promotion in the near future. Also, buying a car in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a beloved person and enjoys a high position in society due to his good morals, intelligence and wisdom. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type Egyptian dream interpretation website on Google. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new car for a single woman Seeing a single woman buying a new car is a sign that she is bored and wants to change some things in her life. If the dreamer buys a new car, the dream indicates that she will soon make an important decision about her future. Buying a new black car in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is smart and strong. It is also an indication that he is currently living a wonderful love story and this story may end in marriage. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new car for a married womanInterpretation scholars believe that the dream of buying a new car for a married woman symbolizes a feeling of happiness and stability in her married life. If the dreamer is newly married and sees herself buying a new, beautiful and expensive car, the dream indicates that she will soon become pregnant if she is planning to get pregnant. From her home to another larger and more spacious house, and many positive changes will soon appear in her life. Interpretation of a dream about my husband buying a new car If the dreamer sees her husband buying a new car, the dream symbolizes that he will get a promotion in his job and increase his financial income in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new car for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman buying a new car is generally good. If a woman buys a yellow car in the vision, the dream may symbolize that her fetus is male and that God Almighty is higher and more, but if the car is red, it may symbolize giving birth to a female Buying a beautiful and luxurious car

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a happy person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a happy person in a dream: Seeing the people we love happy is one of the most important things that can make us feel comfortable and happy. While happiness can fill our hearts when we see them happy, there may be many people in our lives who we want to always be well and happy. They are happy and not affected by sadness as long as their lives last, and it is worth noting that people who are always smiling may be characterized by kindness and a beautiful heart. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a happy person in a dream: Happiness is the maximum that a person can achieve, which is to be happy in his life, and to feel calm in his life and with those around him. And when. Seeing a happy person in a dream may indicate: - It can be considered one of the dreams promising happiness and goodness that awaits God in the coming days. It is also one of the signs of the beginning of a happy life for the monarch, full of positive changes. It is also considered one of the signs of success and superiority that God will achieve in his life. The following. It is worth noting that this vision is one of the signs of comfort and reassurance that the dreamer distinguishes in his life. Ibn Sirin explained that the happiness of another person in a dream is one of the signs that the dreamer will achieve success in his life. Also, seeing someone he knows getting ready and talking to him while he is happy can indicate The strong bond that binds them together. When a married woman sees in a dream that she is happy, this indicates the end of marital problems between her and her husband. Many interpreters have interpreted that seeing a happy person in his dream could mean that he will achieve what he can expect and desire. See also : Interpretation of gray shoes in a dream for a single woman and its most important indications. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a happy occasion in a dream. The happy occasions that may exist in our lives may multiply, either success or joy and many others, and we are always keen to take advantage of this occasion by filling it with joy and pleasure. And seeing a happy occasion in a dream perhaps. It indicates: - If this happy occasion is a joy, it may indicate bad news that God will hear. While the unmarried girl came to Farah in black clothes, she showed the sadness that fills her heart. Going to Farah without a groom in it indicates bad news for the monarch. While, If the dreamer is preparing to go to the event, he has shown his readiness for many changes. When she witnesses an event full of drums and songs, this is evidence of sadness and anxiety in the life of the dreamer. While a married woman goes to a happy occasion, this indicates positive changes that will occur in her life. If A married woman sees that the happy occasion is her marriage, and she may be afflicted with a certain disease, so this indicates her death. When the occasion is filled with songs and drums, it indicates sadness and the loss of a person dear to the fortuneteller. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a crocodile in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a smile from A specific person: Through a smile, a person can reach the hearts of many around him, but the smile is the key to hearts and the dream of a father

title: Interpretation of descending in a dream - seeing descending in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of ascending or descending the stairsDream of descending the stairsInterpretation of the dream of descending, interpretation of the dream of descending the stairsInterpretation of the dream of descending the stairs by Ibn SirinInterpretation of the dream that sees descending: A person separates from who he was beforeInterpretation of falling in a dreamDescending in a dream often indicates an unpleasant vision. Seeing descending a ladder in a dream indicates the fall of money or the fall of power if the dreamer is in a higher position, and because descending the ladder is evidence of a rapid change in the dreamer’s life, as its scholars said in the interpretation.Interpretation of falling in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is descending Quickly down the stairs, this is evidence that this girl revealed the deception of a person who was in her life. Interpretation of falling in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is descending the stairs, but slowly, then this is evidence of worries and problems in this woman’s life, but they will end after a short period, God willing. . I know. Interpretation of going down in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is going down the stairs quickly, this means that the time of birth is approaching, but it will be a difficult birth and she will give birth to a male child, but she will be fine after that. And the concerns of this lady’s life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of falling in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman dreams that she is going down the stairs very quickly and then falls and is not harmed, then this is evidence that there are people who show her love and friendship while harboring grudges and hatred towards her. The deceit of these people will be revealed soon, God willing, and if a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is slowly descending the stairs, this is evidence of marriage soon, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of falling in a dream for a man: If a man sees in a dream that he is quickly descending the stairs and is angry and angry, then this indicates loss. The job in which that dreamer was working. He marries a patient girl who fears God, and God knows best. Seeing down the stairs, YouTube

title: Interpretation of furniture in a dream Seeing furniture in a dream

preview.html: The dream of furniture and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, divorced, man, such as buying new furniture, selling old furniture, seeing new furniture and wooden furniture, changing home furniture, arranging living room furniture, by Ibn Sirin and others on this topic, every piece of furniture that appears in a dream They carry strong meanings, symbols, and associations depending on their value, importance, or status. Because kitchen furniture is not like living room furniture, nor like bedroom furniture, so each piece has different meanings, some of which are related to nourishment, such as cabinets, some of which are related to awareness or emotion, such as a bed, some of which are related to spiritual life, such as a chair or a rug, and some It is related to social life as a desk and table. Interpretation of furniture in a dream. The beauty of the furniture, and the beauty of the view is medicine for the sick, and for the single man, and for the married man to give birth, or marry children, or indicates eating. With money to buy something at the same price as the furniture, the furniture that appears in the dream could be the same The furniture that is actually present in the house or in the house, and in reality tells the viewer the depth and content of his psychological and social life. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is moving his furniture from one house to another, then this is his interpretation that the person is on the verge of a major change in his life, work, or lifestyle. It indicates Moving or transforming furniture means a qualitative change in ideas, attitudes and style, and this transformation is often positive if the moving process is carried out safely without damaging, breaking or scratching the furniture. Interpretation of new furniture in a dream If one dreams of buying or receiving new furniture, this is an expression of sources New money, strength and energy to face a new phase of life characterized by activity, interaction and production. Interpretation of old furniture in a dream If the furniture that was purchased or received was old, used, worn out or unfit for use, this indicates that the dreamer is wasting his time, energy and effort on useless matters and issues. Therefore, he needs to review all his accounts and/or lifestyles, whether through transactions or through actions or even ideas. Interpretation of luxurious and luxurious furniture in a dream. Furniture appears in a dream. Sometimes it is very luxurious and luxurious by the view or even the wood from which it is made, and this, in reality, The inflation of the “I” reflects the viewer in a more precise sense: the fortuneteller lives in a state of narcissism, pride, and compassion, and at the same time rejects change and goes with the times, and this dream is often seen by people who had great ambitions and prospects in the past, but reality shattered all these aspirations and made them mere fantasies. Captive in the mind of the beholder, and therefore this character is broken or defeated from within, and cannot emerge from the crucible of surrender and defeat except through arrogance, inflation, arrogance, and perhaps arrogance and pretense. Interpretation of changing furniture in a dream: A dream about changing furniture in the house indicates a change in the circumstances that control the atmosphere. Home: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is changing the furniture of his old house to new furniture
